P_given_Q.title: Given California's hosting of the Summer Olympics, will the market for dark matter detection technology exceed $10 billion by January 1, 2028?
P_given_Q.body: Suppose the following is true: California's hosting of the Summer Olympics leads to increased funding for dark matter research by January 1, 2028, with documented evidence from reputable funding sources. Additionally, California is officially confirmed as the host for the Summer Olympics by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with confirmation announced through official IOC channels and documented on their website. Then, will the market for dark matter detection technology exceed $10 billion for any calendar year between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028? The market valuation must be reported by a reputable market research firm or financial analysis organization.

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) California is confirmed as the host for the Summer Olympics, and (b) the market for dark matter detection technology exceeds $10 billion?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, California is officially confirmed as the host for the Summer Olympics by the International Olympic Committee (IOC), with the confirmation announced through official IOC channels and documented on their website. (b) Between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, the market for dark matter detection technology exceeds $10 billion for any calendar year, with the market valuation reported by a reputable market research firm or financial analysis organization.

Q.title: Will California be confirmed as the host for the Summer Olympics by January 1, 2028?
Q.body: This question will resolve as 'Yes' if California is officially confirmed as the host for the Summer Olympics by the International Olympic Committee (IOC), with the confirmation announced through official IOC channels and documented on their website, before January 1, 2028.
